name: Karimogi
description:
Karimogi the alien needs you!
The situation is critical. Cranes are dropping bricks everywhere and Karimogi needs your help to push them around and put them in order or he will never see his spaceship again. Arrange the bricks into rows and they will then disappear. But be careful, you must stay very alert because any brick could crush you.
Help Karimogi and become a great architect in a fun and original game that will keep you entertained.

Players: 1
Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 128 KB
